title: Megan Racing SS-HP9296 Generic Short Shifter
features: Easy installation, reduce shift Throw distance
Please make sure to install the control lever inner shift boot to prevent transmission fluid leaks
description: The short Shifter is made with high strength billet steel and nickel plated for ultra low friction and corrosion resistance. The throw is reduced up to 40%, and shift knob height is reduced by 1 to 3 inches depending on the model. These Shifters provide a more precise shift and allows for quicker shifting without drastically changing the overall driving experience. They have been designed specifically for the more aggressive tuner who demands the most extreme Shifter in terms of both looks and performance.
